subject: RE: [junit] RE: Why doesn't JUnit count asserts
msgSnippet: Since I started this whole debate off... I want to make very clear that the only reason we counted asserts was for the mgmt. team s sake.  The developers could
messageBody:
Since I started this whole debate off...

I want to make very clear that the only reason we counted asserts was for
the mgmt. team's sake. The developers could care less. Also, the
developers didn't care exactly how many tests were written. What we wanted
to know was that we had tested everything that could possibly break. End of
story for us.

-Jason
